subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Jack Burke Jr. is the last of a rare breed, the last of the old pros from the Hogan-Snead era, and the last of the golf philosophers to tell it like it really is.
snippet: Jack Burke Jr. is the last of a rare breed, the last of the old pros from the Hogan-Snead era, and the last of the golf philosophers to tell it like it really is.
